description:
Textie™ Messaging is the unlimited texting and photo app for iPhone, iPad, and iPod touch.  Textie lets you send messages to anyone for free, whether they have the app installed or not.  Send messages to other Textie users, any email address, and even to most U.S. mobile phones!*  Replies come back free, too!

Textie is beautiful, fast, secure, and easy to use––a natural extension to your iPhone.  All messages are free, text and pictures.  Textie works independently from your existing SMS plan and billing so you can use Textie free from anywhere in the world.

  "The messaging app for discerning iPhone/iPod touch owners." -SmokingApples.com

  "A great eye for design." -TechCrunch.com

  "This really is the Tweetie of messaging apps." -Horn Solo, User reviews

  "The texting interface will make sense to anyone used to the iPhone's SMS app." -Gizmodo.com

___

* Textie can send free SMS to all Verizon and AT&Ţ numbers. Sending free SMS to T-Mobile phones that do not have Textie installed is not supported.  Please see http://textie.me/sms to learn the details on Textie's free SMS capabilities.
trackCensoredName: Textie Messaging - Beautiful free text chat unlimited (SMS)
trackName: Textie Messaging - Beautiful free text chat unlimited (SMS)
